title: Verify that 'system' operator is not editable in Ord amin/ user

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to systemsetup/orgadmin module and lookup Org: Tixx
goto User tab 
lookup user 'system' (check all radio button)
2. select the Operator
3. verify agency mapping
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. system user should display
check the operator table for the system operator_id: 1
2. Operator details should display, apply change button should be disabled
3. 'system' operator should be mapped to System agency by default and no other option for  lookup should be avilable

title: Verify that 'Useradmin' operator is not editable in Ord amin/ user

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to systemsetup/orgadmin module and lookup Org: Tixx
goto User tab 
lookup operator 'useradmin' (check all radio button)
2. select the operator
3. verify agency mapping
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. useradmin user should display.
check the operator table for the useradmin id: 2
If another useradmin exists with a different id other than 2 it should be renamed to 'useradmin-deprecated'
2. operator details should display, apply change button should be disabled
3. 'useradmin' should be mapped by default to system agency and no other option for lookup should be avilable

title: Verify that 'system' agency is not editable in Ord amin/ Agency
custom_preconds: Access to Org admin and chekc the org to which the system user is mapped

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to systemsetup/orgadmin module and lookup Org: Tixx
goto Agencies tab 
lookup agency 'system' (check all radio button)
2. select the agency
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. system agency should display and should have agnecy id: 4
2. agency details should display, apply change button should be disabled

title: Verify that apply change is disabled if another agency is rename or created with agency code as 'System'

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to systemsetup/orgadmin module and lookup Org: Tixx
goto agnecy tab 
lookup an agency thats not system (check all radio button)
2. select the agnecy 
3. tr to rename the agency code to 'System'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. agency should display and the agency id <> 4
2. agency details will display
3. as soon the name is changed to system for the agency we should see that apply changed is disabled

title: Verify that apply change is disabled in a system where agencyId is 4, agencyCode is not 'SYSTEM' after renaming is sucessfull
custom_preconds:
Access to Org admin
need a system where agencyId is 4, agencyCode is not 'SYSTEM'

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to systemsetup/orgadmin module and lookup Org: Tixx
goto agency tab 
lookup an agency_id 4
2. select the agnecy 
3. tr to rename the agency code to 'System'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. agency should display and name is not System
2. agency details will display
3. we should be able to rename it to system and 'Apply changes' and once saved the apply changed should be disabled.

title: Verify that 'system' operator is not editable in useradmin/ admin and role tabs

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to usermanagement/ usermangement module 
lookup user 'system' (check all radio button)
2. select the Operator
3. goto agency tab
4. goto role tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. system user should display

2. Operator details should display, apply change button and password reset should be disabled
3. agnecy lookup and mapping should be disabled
4. navigating to role tab should disabled

title: Verify that 'Useradmin' operator is not editable in useradmin/ admin and role tabs

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. login to PV with a user who has access to orgadmin
navigate to usermanagement/ usermangement module 
lookup user 'useradmin' (check all radio button)
2. select the Operator
3. goto agency tab
4. goto role tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. useradming operator should display

2. Operator details should display, apply change button and password reset should be disabled
3. agnecy lookup and mapping should be disabled
4. adding additional role should not be an option
